A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It goes to show just how one sided critics are towards disney/marvel/lucas arts. The movie was ok but way to long\, predictable and the cast had weird chemistry. There were way to many characters and there is a whole Fin adventure for really no reason. Many of the scene transitions were jarring and you would jump from an island to a ship to a casino with no real ark to connect you. I would give it a 4 out of 10 stars. Also\, much of the CGI and fight choreography was unappealing.
